June 24, 2016|8:30 AM - 5:30 PM

NICO is a sponsor for The Chicago Area SIAM Student Conference (CASSC) to be held at Northwestern University

April 5, 2014|12:00 PM - 1:00 PM

The Chicago Area SIAM Student Conference (CASSC), a collaboration between IIT, UIC, and NU, celebrates applied mathematics and computational research in Chicagoland. Along with plenary speakers who are leaders in the field, we will be featuring talks showcasing the work of graduate students and accomplished undergraduate students.
